title: Boiler and pressure vessel inspection certificates
dataVerified: Facility address, boiler ID, inspector name/license, pressure rating, inspection date
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake boiler certificates. Domain binding verifies authorized inspector (state/insurance company). Explosion hazard prevention. ASME Boiler Code compliance. Required for insurance coverage.
